$exceptionHandler
***REMOVED*** in module ng

Description

Any uncaught exception in angular expressions is delegated to this ***REMOVED***. The default implementation simply delegates to $log.error which logs it into the browser console.

In unit tests, if angular-mocks.js is loaded, this ***REMOVED*** is overridden by mock $exceptionHandler which aids in testing.

Dependencies

  • $log

Usage

$exceptionHandler(exception[, cause]);

Parameters

ParamTypeDetails
exceptionError

Exception ***REMOVED***ociated with the error.

cause
(optional)
string

optional information about the context in which the error was thrown.
